message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, I am only willing to pay up to $1,200,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is a significant drop from my initial ask. This product offers substantial value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. Would you consider $1,275,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to go up to $1,250,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
